title: Crow Holdings CEO: US Power Getting ‘Gobbled Up'
description: Michael Levy, CEO of Crow Holdings, says power capacity is being rapidly absorbed by data center development across the US. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that energy providers are now requiring large, multi year deposits from developers to secure future power access. (Source: Bloomberg)
